title: Burp Suite proxy
extract: Burp is designed to be used alongside your browser. Burp functions as an HTTP proxy server, and all HTTP/S traffic from your browser passes through Burp. To do any kind of testing with Burp, you need to configure your browser to work with it.
extract_html: Burp is designed to be used alongside your browser. Burp functions as an HTTP proxy server, and all HTTP/S traffic from your browser passes through Burp. To do any kind of testing with Burp, you need to configure your browser to work with it.
